mapper.select: SELECT c.LECTURE_ID, c.Course_ID, c.Class_Capacity, t.Lecture_Type, c.Classroom_Fixed, c.Time_Fixed from lecture c join type_enum t where c.Type_id = t.Type_id
SELECT c.LECTURE_ID, c.Course_ID, c.Class_Capacity, t.Lecture_Type, c.Classroom_Fixed, c.Time_Fixed from lecture c join type_enum t where c.Type_id = t.Type_id and c.Class_capacity>100
SELECT c.LECTURE_ID, c.Course_ID, c.Class_Capacity, t.Lecture_Type, c.Classroom_Fixed, c.Time_Fixed from lecture c join type_enum t where c.type_id=2 and c.Type_id = t.Type_id

SELECT l.lecture_id, l.Course_ID, l.Class_Capacity, t.Lecture_Type, l.Classroom_Fixed, l.Time_Fixed FROM lecture l join classroom c join building b join type_enum t where l.Type_id=3 and l.Type_id = t.Type_id and l.classroom_id= c.classroom_id and c.building_id=b.building_id and (b.sector_id=3 or b.sector_id=4)

SELECT l.lecture_id, l.Course_ID, l.Class_Capacity, t.Lecture_Type, l.Classroom_Fixed, l.Time_Fixed FROM lecture l join classroom c join building b join type_enum t where l.Type_id=3 and l.Type_id = t.Type_id and l.classroom_id= c.classroom_id and c.building_id=b.building_id and (b.sector_id=1 or b.sector_id=2 or b.sector_id=5 or b.sector_id=6)

SELECT l.lecture_id, l.Course_ID, l.Class_Capacity, t.Lecture_Type, l.Classroom_Fixed, l.Time_Fixed FROM lecture l join classroom c join building b join type_enum t where (l.Type_id=1 or l.Type_id=4) and l.Type_id = t.Type_id and l.classroom_id= c.classroom_id and c.building_id=b.building_id and (b.sector_id=3 or b.sector_id=4)

SELECT l.lecture_id, l.Course_ID, l.Class_Capacity, t.Lecture_Type, l.Classroom_Fixed, l.Time_Fixed FROM lecture l join classroom c join building b join type_enum t where (l.Type_id=1 or l.Type_id=4) and l.Type_id = t.Type_id and l.classroom_id= c.classroom_id and c.building_id=b.building_id and (b.sector_id=1 or b.sector_id=2 or b.sector_id=5 or b.sector_id=6)
SELECT Day_ID, Start, End from lecture_time where Lecture_ID= #{id}
SELECT p.Professor_ID, p.Professor_name from lecture_professor c join professor p where c.Lecture_ID= #{id} and c.Professor_ID= p.Professor_ID
SELECT a.Accessory_ID from lecture_accessory c join accessory_enum a where c.Lecture_ID= #{id} and c.Accessory_ID= a.Accessory_ID
SELECT r.Classroom_ID, r.Classroom_Number, r.Classroom_Capacity, r.Building_ID from classroom r join lecture c where c.Lecture_ID= #{id} and r.Classroom_ID= c.Classroom_ID
SELECT c.LECTURE_ID, c.Course_ID, c.Class_Capacity, t.Lecture_Type, c.Classroom_Fixed, c.Time_Fixed from lecture c join type_enum t where c.Type_id = t.Type_id and time_fixed=1
SELECT c.LECTURE_ID, c.Course_ID, c.Class_Capacity, t.Lecture_Type, c.Classroom_Fixed, c.Time_Fixed from lecture c join type_enum t where c.Type_id = t.Type_id and Classroom_Fixed=1

SELECT c.LECTURE_ID, c.Course_ID, c.Class_Capacity, t.Lecture_Type, c.Classroom_Fixed, c.Time_Fixed from lecture c join type_enum t join course r where c.Type_id = t.Type_id and c.course_id= r.course_id and r.level_id= 3
